text: If I have defined a Convex.jl problem, is there a way to ask Convex if the problem is representable on a particular form, e.g., `is_qp(problem)::Bool`?

elements.text: If I have defined a Convex.jl problem, is there a way to ask Convex if the problem is representable on a particular form, e.g.,

text: No, but Convex reformulates all problems to have a linear objective subject to conic constraints, and what kind of cones you get is kind of in the docs

elements.text: No, but Convex reformulates all problems to have a linear objective subject to conic constraints, and what kind of cones you get is kind of in the docs
